messages.title: THE CONSERVATIVES' CRIMINAL RECORD:
messages.content: Knife crime has increased by over 75 percent since 2015; homicides are at their highest rate for a decade; robberies and thefts are increasing and almost all go unsolved; there are more and more places in the country where people simply don't see police officers.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Invest £1 billion to restore community policing, enough for two new police officers in every council ward. Provide a £500 million fund to repair the damage done to youth services. Fully fund an immediate two per cent pay-rise for police officers to support recruitment and retention. End the disproportionate use of Stop and Search.

issues.brexitEurope: are too distracted by their arguments on Brexit to be able to focus on the urgent problems our public services are facing.
issues.education: also address other factors such as in-work poverty and school exclusions
issues.health: the NHS yet again in crisis, cuts being made to schools, and the police suffering from underfunding

leaflet.personalStatement: I know first-hand how Mr Johnson oversaw the devastation of community policing in London - which is now helping to fuel knife crime violence in the capital.

politicalExperience.role: Former Deputy Assistant Commissioner, Metropolitan Police Service

contactInformation.address: Liberal Democrats, 8-10 Great George Street, London, SW1P 3AE

quotes.text: Knife crime hits new record high
Criminals going unpunished because of cuts, says police chief.

images.caption: THE CONSERVATIVES' CRIMINAL RECORD showing image of broken window and newspaper headlines.
Picture of police officers with the title MORE MONEY FOR OUR POLICE from the LIBERAL DEMOCRAT PLAN.

leaflet.additionalNotes: PS. The Liberal Democrat plan means more police focussed on the community policing that prevents crime and makes people feel safe.
